item.description:
For Jazz Week
www.northshorejazzproject.org
May 2,
1-4:30 p.m.
DANNY HARRINGTON >> AND FRIENDS
Plus
MYANNA, AMANDA CARR >>, PHIL PORTER, MYANNA and more!
$20 at the door, $17 in advance at www.northshorejazzproject.org

Chianti Tuscan Restaruant
285 Cabot St.
Beverly, MA

Danny Harrrington, a faculty member of the Berklee College of Music, headlines this fundraiser for educational workshops in Norh Shore high schools. Danny?s toured with the Tommy Dorsey Orchestra & he has performed with Nick Brignola, Gary Burton, Herb Pomeroy, Gary Smulyan, Joe Lovano, George Garzone as well as leading his own group. This concert celebrates Jazz Week and is dedicated to Lennie Sogoloff, who for years, brought such stars like Duke Ellington, Coleman Hawkins, Buddy Rich, and Bette Midler to the North Shore as the owner of Lennie's on the Turnpike. Performing with Danny are fellow Berklee faculty members: John Baboian (guitar), Bruce Gertz (bass). and Phil McGowan (drums). MYANNA, AMANDA CARR, PHIL PORTER, MYANNA and more!
item.name: NS Jazz Project Event... and fundraiser for school jazz workshops
